rules_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: [i]A scream of liquid noise consumed Xeia's vision. The track, the finish line, the stands, all dissolved into a glitchy mass of red distortion. Her bones rattled and her blood howled.[/i]

 She fell through the chaos, bracing for a ground she could not see.
